Contributor: Tornrose, Axel, artist.; Riesenberg, Sidney H., artist.;
Note: Signed "Sidney H. Riesenberg" and "Axel Tornrose." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Pre-World War I poster shows two U.S. Marines hoisting the American flag on foreign soil. Along the top and left side border appear black and white drawings of Marines on overseas duty. Text says to join the U.S. Marines and enlist.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
